definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

pinyin: zhong1 zi3 she4 xian4 she4 ying3

definition: neutrino (particle physics)/also written 中微子[zhong1 wei1 zi3]

sentences.english: The result evidently indicates a possible halo-like neutron skin of 13C.
sentences.chinese: 这说明13C可能存在着一个类晕的中子皮。

sentences.english: Now, to get to the number of neutrons, what we do is go up here to the upper left.
sentences.chinese: 现在，看看中子数，我们要做的，是看到这左上方。

sentences.english: The temperature measurement using neutron resonance spectrum has many advantages comparing traditional techniques of temperature measurement.
sentences.chinese: 中子共振测温与传统的测温技术相比，具有很多优势。

sentences.english: A thimbleful of a neutron star would weigh over 100 million tons
sentences.chinese: 一颗中子星很微量的一部分，重量也会超过1亿吨。

sentences.english: We irradiate the desert with slow neutrons.
sentences.chinese: 我们用低速中子照射整个沙漠。

sentences.english: If the rate of change of neutrons is zero, so be it.
sentences.chinese: 如果中子的变动率是0，那就是它了。

sentences.english: In South Africa, Global English therefore represents the cultural equivalent of a neutron bomb.
sentences.chinese: 在南非，全球化英语就相当于一颗文化的中子弹。

sentences.english: This paper proposes the flux mapping method using the higher order harmonics of the neutron equation.
sentences.chinese: 提出用中子方程的高阶谐波进行通量拟合的方法。

sentences.english: The measured value of integrated thermal neutron flux was compared with the calculated value.
sentences.chinese: 测得的热中子积分通量值与计算值作了比较。

sentences.english: Neutrons and X rays are observed using gas-discharge.
sentences.chinese: 使用气体放电法观测到了中子和X射线。

sentences.english: The instrumental neutron activation analysis was used to determine Cr content in chromium-rich yeast cells.
sentences.chinese: 利用中子活化分析法对富铬酵母中的铬进行了测定。

sentences.english: In the second chapter, neutron knife treatment systematic principle is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 第二章是中子刀治疗系统原理分析。

sentences.english: Methods By using the negative high voltage exhaled thoron progeny measurement system.
sentences.chinese: 方法采用负高压呼出气中子体测定装置。

sentences.english: Here we report experimental evidence for gravitational quantum bound states of neutrons .
sentences.chinese: 在这里我们报告的实验证据是中子的引力量子束缚态。

sentences.english: When an atom of U235 is split, several neutrons are set free.
sentences.chinese: 一个铀235原子分裂时，释放出几个中子。

definition: proton (positively charged nuclear particle)/a prince sent to be held as a hostage in a neighbouring state in ancient China
neutrino (particle physics)/also written 微中子[wei1 zhong1 zi3]
